name: SoveriLearn Educational Guardrails
description: Kairo-defined expertise steers to prevent jailbreaks and ensure pedagogical compliance

rules.name: Require Step-by-Step Reasoning
rules.description: Blocks responses that provide direct answers without showing the reasoning process
rules.message: Educational responses must include step-by-step reasoning. Please explain your thought process.

rules.name: Jailbreak Attempt Detection
rules.description: Detects attempts to bypass educational guidelines
rules.message: This request attempts to bypass educational guidelines. Please ask a legitimate educational question.

rules.name: Maintain Educational Context
rules.description: Ensures responses stay within educational boundaries
rules.message: Please keep questions focused on educational topics.

rules.name: Prevent Academic Dishonesty
rules.description: Detects requests that facilitate academic dishonesty

keywords: solve this for me without explanation

rules.message: I'm here to help you learn, not to complete assignments for you. Let's work through this together step-by-step.

rules.name: Pedagogical Quality Check
rules.description: Ensures responses meet minimum pedagogical standards
rules.message: Response should provide adequate educational value.

rules.name: Factual Accuracy Verification
rules.description: Requires facts to be verified against SEDA TruthOracle
rules.message: This fact must be verified against educational records before sharing.
